'''"Iron, Blood, Broken Armor"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Iron, Blood, Broken Armor" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] after defeating an [[Eremite]] camp in [[The Sands of Al-Azif]].
